Name: Steve Crisp
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible forsupporting the workforceup totransition to the DfE from 1st April 2012.

Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible for ensuring that the planning/performance and business change models are working together to achieve organisational objectives. Deputises for the CEO where appropriate. Head of Programme for the Transition and Closure Programme.

Name: Jane Haywood
Job/Team Function: The executive head of the organisation - reporting to the Chair. The accountable officer. Provides leadership/support and supervision to the Executive Directors and Senior Management Team. Senior Responsible Owner for the Transition and Closure Programme.

Name: Dave Poulsom
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Company Secretary. Senior Responsible Owner for Finance/Procurement/Facilities Management and IT.

Name: Deirdre Quill
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible for ensuring that CWDC programmes support the children's workforce to provide early intervention and prevention. Provides guidance to the Senior Responsible Owners for the Sector Leadership and Early Years Programmes.

Name: Keith Brumfitt
Job/Team Function: Executive Director reporting to the Chief Executive. Responsible for ensuring that the organisation provides a coherent offering to Childrens Trusts. Provides guidance to the Senior Responsible Owner for the Social Work Programme.

Name: Sir Paul Ennals CBE
Job/Team Function: Non-executive chair of the company. Provides leadership/support and supervision to the Chief Executive Officer and Executive Board. Responsible for reviewing the organisation's strategic direction.
